Johnnan is a digital designer and developer based in New York City. He is experienced in creating games, websites, and augmented and virtual reality (AR/VR) applications. His skillset includes Unity with various networking and VR frameworks, React, three.js, and 8th wall.

He graduated with a BS Degree in Computer Science and Mathematics from the Macaulay Honors College in New York City. His background includes taking on an fellowship progam with a AR/VR research facility and working for a VR forensics startup. Currently, he is working full time at a healthcare media production agency and developing various interactive websites, games, and AR/VR experiences.
